channel.title: ASF Jira
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HIVE-29187] Unable to parse explain analyze statement when query has quoted identifier with special character
item.description:
explain analyze
select 1 as `two words`

item.summary: Unable to parse explain analyze statement when query has quoted identifier with special character

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment: Merged to master. Thanks dkuzmenko and thomas.rebele for the review.
